Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards

Class SwapWithOpponent

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.DivinityDecoratorWithEffects
it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards.MoveOnOpponent
it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards.SwapWithOpponent
All Implemented Interfaces:
Divinity
public class SwapWithOpponent
extends MoveOnOpponent
When this God, Apollo, moves onto an opponent tile, his worker and the opponent's swap their positions

legalMove and move are the functions affected in this class: legalMove(Board,Worker, Tile) has to perform several tests to verify the possibility of movement; PushOpponent.move(Board,Worker, Tile) has to access the Match in order to retrieve and move the opponent's Worker

    java.util.List<ModelUpdate> move​(Board board, Worker selectedWorker, Tile selectedTile)
    If the selected tile is occupied by an opponent worker, such worker and his tile are saved and the swap takes place.

  • Method Details

    • move

      public java.util.List<ModelUpdate> move​(Board board, Worker selectedWorker, Tile selectedTile)
      If the selected tile is occupied by an opponent worker, such worker and his tile are saved and the swap takes place. Otherwise it is a simple move
      Specified by:
      move in interface Divinity
      Overrides:
      move in class MoveOnOpponent
      Parameters:
      board - current Board
      selectedWorker - Selected worker from the Match
      selectedTile - Tile to move onto
      Returns:
      list of all the modified tiles to be sent to the view

    • legalMove

      public boolean legalMove​(Board board, Worker selectedWorker, Tile selectedTile)
      An ArrayList is created to prevent the player from committing a rare losing condition: The player swaps on a Tile where he will not be able to build; i.e. the worker is surrounded by domes or other workers.
      Specified by:
      legalMove in interface Divinity
      Overrides:
      legalMove in class MoveOnOpponent
      Parameters:
      board - current Board
      selectedWorker - Worker whose move is verified
      selectedTile - Tile to check
      Returns:
      true if the worker moves on a free tile or an occupied tile and will be able to build
